name: COHREP_GLOBAL1
description: Global data with no security. Examples: Item type, buyers,  categories, etc

pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Item_Type = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
  FLV.LOOKUP_CODE ITEM_TYPE_CODE,
  MEANING ITEM_TYPE_NAME,
  ENABLED_FLAG
FROM
  APPS.FND_LOOKUP_VALUES_VL FLV
WHERE
  LOOKUP_TYPE = 'ITEM_TYPE'
  AND enabled_flag = 'Y'
  AND exists (select 1 from inv.mtl_system_items_b msi where msi.item_type = flv.lookup_code)
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ITEM_TYPE_CODE", "Item Type Code"}, {"ITEM_TYPE_NAME", "Item Type Name"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Sales_Commodity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
  category_id,
  segment1 COMMODITY
FROM
  apps.mtl_categories_v MC
WHERE
  structure_name = 'Commodity'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"COMMODITY", "Sales Commodity"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Sourcing_Commodity = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
  category_id,
  segment1,
  segment2 SUBCATEGORY,
  segment3 UNSPSC_CODE,
  MC.SEGMENT1 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT2 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT3 SOURCING_COMMODITY
FROM
  apps.mtl_categories_v MC
WHERE
  structure_name = 'Sourcing Commodity'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"SOURCING_COMMODITY", "Sourcing Commodity"}, {"SUBCATEGORY", "Sourcing Subcategory"}, {"UNSPSC_CODE", "UNSPSC Code"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Product_Category = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="  
SELECT
   SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,
   MC.CATEGORY_ID,
   MC.SEGMENT1 TBU,
   MC.SEGMENT2 PRODUCT_FAMILY,
   MC.SEGMENT3 PRODUCT_LINE,
   MC.SEGMENT4 FORECAST,
   MC.SEGMENT1 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT2 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT3 || '.' || MC.SEGMENT4 PRODUCT_CATEGORY 
FROM
   APPS.MTL_CATEGORIES_V MC 
WHERE 1=1
AND Structure_name = 'Product Family/Line'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Product Family"}, {"FORECAST", "Forecast Field"}, {"PRODUCT_LINE", "Product Line"}, {"PRODUCT_CATEGORY", "Product Category"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Account = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
select
   sysdate  EXTRACT_DATE,
   VL.FLEX_VALUE ACCOUNT,
   TL.DESCRIPTION ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION 
from
   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_TL TL,
   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES VL,
   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FST 
where
   1 = 1 
   AND TL.FLEX_VALUE_ID( + ) = VL.FLEX_VALUE_ID 
   AND TL.LANGUAGE ( + ) = 'US' 
   AND VL.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' 
   AND VL.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID 
   AND FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'COHR_Acct'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ACCOUNT", "GL Account Code"}, {"ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION", "GL Account"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Department = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
select

   VL.FLEX_VALUE DEPARTMENT_CODE,
   TL.DESCRIPTION
from

where

   AND VL.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' 
   AND VL.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID 
   AND FST.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME = 'COHR_Dept'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"DEPARTMENT_CODE", "GL Department Code"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "GL Department"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";

shared Replenishment_Method = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i45W8g0KUIrViVbyTsxLSswDM30z8xR8EyvA7DBfTzDtl1+iEJCTmJeXmgLhOyrFxgIA", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Replenishment Method" = _t])

shared ABC_Class = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i45WMlTSUXJUitWJVjICspzALGMgyxnMMgGyXCMCwGwzINsvv0TBsaAgJzM5MSknFSxsCtKWk5iXrRQbCwA=", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Sort Order" = _t, #"ABC-EXP Class" = _t]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Sort Order", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"Sort Order", Order.Ascending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
shared Fiscal_Calendar = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
 SELECT
    sysdate                                                                                       extract_date,
    al1.period_date                                                                               calendar_date,
    al1.year_start_date                                                                           fc_year_start_date,
    al1.period_year                                                                               fc_year,
    al1.quarter_start_date                                                                        fc_quarter_start_date,
    'Q' || al1.quarter_num                                                                        fc_quarter,
    CASE
        WHEN al1.quarter_num <= 2 THEN
            'H1'
        ELSE
            'H2'
    END fc_half,
    al1.period_num                                                                                fc_period_number,
    substr(al1.period_name, 1, 3)                                                                 fc_period_month,
    al1.period_name                                                                               fc_period_name,
    ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 12 + al1.period_num                                                 fc_period_id,
    ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 4 + al1.quarter_num                                                 fc_quarter_id,
    ceil((al1.period_date - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) / 7)                           fc_week_id,
    al1.period_year - (
        SELECT
            ( cd.period_year )
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    gdpm.period_set_name,
                    gp.period_name,
                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,
                    gp.period_year,
                    gp.period_num,
                    gp.quarter_num,
                    gp.year_start_date,
                    gp.quarter_start_date
                FROM
                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,
                    gl.gl_periods            gp
                WHERE
                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name
                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name
                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)
            ) cd
    ) fc_year_offset,
    ( ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 4 + al1.quarter_num ) - (
        SELECT
            ( cd.period_year - 1 ) * 4 + cd.quarter_num
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    gdpm.period_set_name,
                    gp.period_name,
                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,
                    gp.period_year,
                    gp.period_num,
                    gp.quarter_num,
                    gp.year_start_date,
                    gp.quarter_start_date
                FROM
                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,
                    gl.gl_periods            gp
                WHERE
                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name
                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name
                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)
            ) cd
    ) fc_quarter_offset,
    ( ( al1.period_year - 1 ) * 12 + al1.period_num ) - (
        SELECT
            ( cd.period_year - 1 ) * 12 + cd.period_num
        FROM
            (
                SELECT
                    gdpm.period_set_name,
                    gp.period_name,
                    gdpm.accounting_date period_date,
                    gp.period_year,
                    gp.period_num,
                    gp.quarter_num,
                    gp.year_start_date,
                    gp.quarter_start_date
                FROM
                    gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,
                    gl.gl_periods            gp
                WHERE
                        gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
                    AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name
                    AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name
                    AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)
            ) cd
    ) fc_period_offset,
    ( al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date ) + 1                                                 doy_number,
    ( al1.period_date - trunc(sysdate) )                                                          fc_day_offset,
    CASE
        WHEN ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7) < 10 THEN
            'W0'
            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)
        ELSE
            'W'
            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)
    END fc_week,
    CASE
        WHEN ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date + 1) / 7) < 10 THEN
            'QW0'
            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date + 1) / 7)
        ELSE
            'QW'
            || ceil((al1.period_date - al1.quarter_start_date - 1) / 7)
    END fc_quarter_week,
    ceil((al1.period_date - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) / 7) - ceil(((trunc(sysdate)) - TO_DATE('02-OCT-1999', 'DD-MON-RRRR')) /
    7) fc_week_offset,
    ( al1.period_year * 100 + ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7) )               fc_week_series,
    ceil((al1.period_date - al1.year_start_date + 1) / 7)  fc_week_number,
    to_char(al1.period_date, 'DAY')                                                                 day_name,
    to_char(al1.period_date, 'D')                                                                  dow_number
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            gdpm.period_set_name,
            gp.period_name,
            gdpm.accounting_date period_date,
            gp.period_year,
            gp.period_num,
            gp.quarter_num,
            gp.year_start_date,
            gp.quarter_start_date
        FROM
            gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,
            gl.gl_periods            gp
        WHERE
                gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
            AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name
            AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name
    ) al1
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"FC_YEAR_START_DATE", "FC Year Start Date"}, {"FC_YEAR", "FC Year"}, {"FC_QUARTER_START_DATE", "FC Quarter Start Date"}, {"FC_QUARTER", "FC Quarter"}, {"FC_PERIOD_NUMBER", "FC Period Number"}, {"FC_PERIOD_MONTH", "FC Period Month"}, {"FC_HALF", "FC Half"}, {"FC_PERIOD_NAME", "FC Period Name"}, {"FC_WEEK_SERIES", "FC Week Series"}, {"FC_WEEK_NUMBER", "FC Week Number"}, {"FC_QUARTER_WEEK", "FC Quarter Week"}, {"FC_WEEK", "FC Week"}, {"FC_DAY_OFFSET", "FC Day Offset"}, {"FC_WEEK_OFFSET", "FC Week Offset"}, {"FC_PERIOD_OFFSET", "FC Period Offset"}, {"FC_QUARTER_OFFSET", "FC Quarter Offset"}, {"FC_YEAR_OFFSET", "FC Year Offset"}, {"CALENDAR_DATE", "Calendar Date"}, {"FC_WEEK_ID", "FC Week ID"}, {"FC_PERIOD_ID", "FC Period ID"}, {"FC_QUARTER_ID", "FC Quarter ID"}, {"DOY_NUMBER", "Day of Year Number"}, {"DAY_NAME", "Day Name"}, {"DOW_NUMBER", "Day of Week Number"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared MPN = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
  sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
  MPN.manufacturer_name,
  MPN.mfg_part_num,
  MPN.inventory_item_id,
  (SELECT
    MSI.segment1
  FROM inv.mtl_system_items_b MSI
  WHERE MSI.inventory_item_id = MPN.inventory_item_id
  AND rownum = 1)
  ITEM_NUMBER
FROM
  apps.MTL_MFG_PART_NUMBERS_ALL_V MPN
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"MANUFACTURER_NAME", "Manufacturer Name"}, {"MFG_PART_NUM", "Manufacturer Part Number"}, {"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Order_Transaction_Type = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
  SELECT
  SYSDATE EXTRACT_DATE,
   OTTL.NAME,
   OTTL.DESCRIPTION,
   OTTA.SCHEDULING_LEVEL_CODE,
   OTTA.TRANSACTION_TYPE_ID,
   OTTA.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE,
   OTTA.ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE,
   OTTA.START_DATE_ACTIVE,
   OTTA.END_DATE_ACTIVE,
   OTTA.CONTEXT,
   OTTA.ATTRIBUTE5 TP_CLASSIFICATION,
   OTTA.ATTRIBUTE6 ENTITY,
   OTTA.ATTRIBUTE15 TAX_APPLICABILITY,
   OTTA.ATTRIBUTE13 ACCOUNTING_TYPE,
   OTTA.ATTRIBUTE4 REVENUE_FLAG
FROM
   APPS.OE_TRANSACTION_TYPES_ALL OTTA,
   APPS.OE_TRANSACTION_TYPES_TL OTTL 
WHERE
   OTTA.TRANSACTION_TYPE_ID = OTTL.TRANSACTION_TYPE_ID 
   AND OTTL.LANGUAGE = 'US'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"NAME", "Name"}, {"ORDER_CATEGORY_CODE", "Order Category Code"}, {"TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE", "Transaction Type Code"}, {"SCHEDULING_LEVEL_CODE", "Scheduling Level Code"}, {"CONTEXT", "Context"}, {"TP_CLASSIFICATION", "TP Classification"}, {"ENTITY", "Entity"}, {"TAX_APPLICABILITY", "Tax Applicability"}, {"ACCOUNTING_TYPE", "Accounting Type"}, {"START_DATE_ACTIVE", "Start Date"}, {"END_DATE_ACTIVE", "End Date"}, {"DESCRIPTION", "Description"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"REVENUE_FLAG", "Revenue Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared TBU = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="  
SELECT
   sysdate EXTRACT_DATE,
   FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME,
   FVS.DESCRIPTION VALUE_SET_DESCRIPTION,
   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID,
   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_ID,
   FLV.FLEX_VALUE,
   FLV.FLEX_VALUE_MEANING,
   FLV.DESCRIPTION VALUE_DESCRIPTION,
   FLV.END_DATE_ACTIVE,
   FLV.ENABLED_FLAG
FROM
   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUES_VL FLV,
   APPS.FND_FLEX_VALUE_SETS FVS 
WHERE
   FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FLV.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID 
   AND UPPER(FVS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME) LIKE '%TBU%'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"FLEX_VALUE_SET_NAME", "Value Set Name"}, {"VALUE_SET_DESCRIPTION", "Value Set Description"}, {"FLEX_VALUE", "Flex Value"}, {"FLEX_VALUE_MEANING", "Flex Value Meaning"}, {"VALUE_DESCRIPTION", "Value Description"}, {"END_DATE_ACTIVE", "End Date Active"}, {"ENABLED_FLAG", "Enabled Flag"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
